content.raw:
That's a good point, I had already thought about it and agree with you. I can move this specific instance back to the main example body.

As for the changes on the `rfid_callback`, I'd like the robot to immediately cancel the current goal once the RFID goes out of range, so that the robot doesn't move too far away while the current goal hasn't timed out yet. I can move the change of state (line 114) back to the main example body, but I'll need to keep the state check (line 111) and the goal cancellation (line 113) in the callback - unless you can think of a nice way to interrupt the goal outside of the callback.
